ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Compact Spherical Coil (CSC) Fluxgate Vector Magnetometer
ResourceHeader.Description: The Compact Spherical Coil (CSC) Fluxgate Vector Magnetometer is one of four instruments onboard the Oersted spacecraft. http://iopscience.iop.org/0022-3735/15/2/015;jsessionid=DF7F419659527B03C6310FAA1EFED488.c1
